results.question: How do I open a current account online?
results.answer: Our new online Current Account application is simple, fast and you get your card send out tomorrow! You will need a form of ID, access to a webcam during the application and a few details you should already know.

results.question: How do I open a savings account?
results.answer: Just pop into a store or apply online. If you're an existing customer you can open an account by logging in to internet banking or by calling us on 0345 08 08 500. What you need to bring with you if you come into store.

results.question: How do I open a cash account?
results.answer: Manage your everyday spending without the complications of Direct Debits and standing orders. Just pop into the store – no appointment needed. We’ll even print your bank card there and then.

results.question: How do I open a kids account?
results.answer: It's never too early to start saving. If you've got a special purchase in mind, or you want to start putting money away for an upcoming holiday or life-changing trip, open a Young Savers account and watch your money grow.

results.question: How do I open a fixed term savings account?
results.answer: Choose how long you want to put your money away for – 3 months, 6 months, 1 year, 18 months or 3 years. You’ll need another Metro Bank account for the interest from your Fixed Term Savings Account to be paid into.

results.question: How do I open a current account online?
results.answer: Our new online Current Account application is simple, fast and you get your card send out tomorrow! You will need a form of ID, access to a webcam during the application and a few details you should already know.

results.question: How to open a Safe Deposit Box
results.answer: . You can pick from 5 sizes of Safe Deposit Box to suit your needs, and you can have access to your valuables whenever you need to. Rent a box for the long or short term – it’s up to you. Just choose which store you want to have your box in and reserve online.
